timeline.bodyText:
change
The file {0} can not be read. 
to
The {0} file can not be read.
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -476,5 +476,10 @@ error.root.must.be.server=CWWKG0105E: The {0} configuration document must begin
 error.root.must.be.server.explanation=The configuration must be contained in either a server element or a client element. 
 error.root.must.be.server.useraction=Add a server or client element as the root of the configuration file. 
 
+error.bad.variable.file=CWWKG0106E: The file {0} can not be read.

timeline.bodyText:
change
Verify that the file contains text content and check operating system permissions on the file.
to
Verify that the file contains text content and check the operating system permissions for the file.
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -476,5 +476,10 @@ error.root.must.be.server=CWWKG0105E: The {0} configuration document must begin
 error.root.must.be.server.explanation=The configuration must be contained in either a server element or a client element. 
 error.root.must.be.server.useraction=Add a server or client element as the root of the configuration file. 
 
+error.bad.variable.file=CWWKG0106E: The file {0} can not be read. 
+error.bad.variable.file.explanation=The file can not be loaded as a variable because it can not be read. 
+error.bad.variable.file.useraction=Verify that the file contains text content and check operating system permissions on the file.

timeline.bodyText: is it possible to say why the file can't be read or what cannot read it?
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -476,5 +476,10 @@ error.root.must.be.server=CWWKG0105E: The {0} configuration document must begin
 error.root.must.be.server.explanation=The configuration must be contained in either a server element or a client element. 
 error.root.must.be.server.useraction=Add a server or client element as the root of the configuration file. 
 
+error.bad.variable.file=CWWKG0106E: The file {0} can not be read. 
+error.bad.variable.file.explanation=The file can not be loaded as a variable because it can not be read.

replies.bodyText: Not really.. We just know that something went wrong. The most likely causes are in the user action.
replies.author: brenthdaniel

timeline.message: Add support for using kube secrets as variables
Code review - remove comments and fix unit test
Fix embedded server's use of bootstrap locations
